author: bridge-bot
content:
<RobertoSaltini> Which Dynamically Available protocol are you guys implementing at the moment?
LMD-GHOST, RLMD, something else?

author: bridge-bot
content:
<tcoratger> re: **@RobertoSaltini**
> Which Dynamically Available protocol are you guys implementing at the moment?
LMD-GHOST, RLMD, something else?
LMD GHOST for now https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanSpec/blob/632a7b78b00bdf2825aba85fe5b4d0f9dd92a2f5/docs/client/forkchoice.md?plain=1#L6 unless you client teams have something else in mind for upcoming devnets? But I guess this is something we could experiment with since for now devnets are really small in terms of code
